metadata.title: Morphogen treatment protocol with concentration gradients

params.note: Morphogen treatment modalities shown: concentration gradients with darker shading indicating higher concentration; untreated controls marked with 'X'. Timing: early (up) to late (down). Marker genes include POU5F1, TFAP2A, SOX2, STMN2, FOXG1, NKX2-1, VSX2, HOXB2, FOXA2.
